snippet.title: Cull the Gods - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
DOWNLOAD CULL THE GODS HERE: https://fatherbeno.itch.io/cull-the-gods
LISTEN TO MAIN THEME HERE: https://youtu.be/o9YpEDc-ZTw

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Through fast paced, skill-oriented combat Cull the Gods gives the player the chance to live out their all powerful, god slaying fantasy when they battle opposing deities. Using the might of their sword, skill and determination they tackle the challenge of culling the gods that plague the world. Only those who are truly worthy can complete this challenge.

It is a third person arcade styled beat ‘em up which the gameplay is more focused on skilled timing and fast paced combat. There are too many "gods" that exist within mankind and are destroying the fabric of the world with their constant fighting. In a last attempt to restore peace to the world, you are chosen by a divine being and given the ability to deflect any incoming attack, in order to cull the gods.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Cull the Gods is a student project developed over the course of 25 weeks in our last two trimesters. It is our major and we have poured our heart and souls into this game so we would really appreciate it if you gave it a try!

Cull the Gods was created by:
Benjamin Gulliver - Team Manager, Systems Programmer, Marketing
EMAIL: benjamin@gulliver.com.au
PORTFOLIO: https://benjamingulliver.com/
ITCH.IO: https://fatherbeno.itch.io/

Kevin Tse Kai Wai - Boss AI Programmer
EMAIL: kevin.tsekaiwai@gmail.com
PORTFOLIO: https://1016452.wixsite.com/kevintsekaiwai/
ITCH.IO: https://kevin-t.itch.io/

Neo Sengyothinh - Character Controller Programmer
EMAIL: sengyothinhchs@gmail.com
PORTFOLIO: https://neo-sengyothinh.squarespace.com/
ITCH.IO: https://theghotr.itch.io/

Hamish Ragg - Sound Engineer
EMAIL: Hamish.Ragg@gmail.com
PORTFOLIO: https://sites.google.com/student.sae.edu.au/1012108-portfolio/home/

Leon Lao - Graphic Designer
EMAIL: leonlao27@gmail.com
PORTFOLIO: https://leonlao27.wixsite.com/website/

& Natasha Almmaddine - Level Designer.
